Class WorkaroundJibxMarshaller

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InitializingBean, Marshaller, Unmarshaller
    public class WorkaroundJibxMarshaller
extends JibxMarshaller
    JibxMarshaller that works around two bugs: JIBX-492 and JDK-8016914.
